item.description:
Join members of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group as we start our Cooking Classes!  Debbi has dozens of cookbooks with thousands of recipes, loves to cook and is willing to share her talents with us.  This will be a fun way to learn how to cook new recipes, taste them and socialize!  We may even plan an item that we will make next month at tonight's Cooking Class.  This month we are meeting on Sunday to enjoy the pleasures of Brunch, including Breakfast Foods!

 

Today we will be making something that you suggested on the "Cooking Classes!" Discussion Thread.  We will peruse the replies and do our best to pick from the suggestions of those who have RSVPed Yes thus far.  We will update with more details about a week before the event. Click on the following link to be taken to the Discussion Thread to post your suggestions.  Please let us know what types of Breakfast/Brunch foods you would like to learn to cook by posting in the Talk About It Section (at the bottom of this page) or on the Discussion Thread (by clicking on the link here).  http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/messages/boards/thread/17992182  

 

Let us know your general availability for our monthly Cooking Classes by clicking on the following link to vote in the Poll.  http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/polls/420042/

 

TODAY'S MENU:

Sundried Tomato & Spinach Fritatta

Sweet & Spicy Bacon

Cinnamon Pull-Apart Bread

Minted Fruit Salad

Peach/Lemonade Flip (semi frozen non-alcoholic drink)

 

 

Class Details:

*All of the food will be purchased ahead of time by the Event Organizers.  Cost will be approximately $10-$15 per person (excluding Debbi) plus any applicable Event Fees.  Please bring cash.  (This is very inexpensive compared to most cooking classes and dinners!)

*Please let us know in your RSVP Comments if you have a Food Allergy.  We will make sure we exclude that from whatever we cook.

*After we prepare and cook we will dine and sample our creations.

*We will provide a copy of all recipes for everyone to take home with them.

*Please bring 1-2 (one to two) 1-serving (one serving) containers.  We will do our best to send everyone home with at least one serving.  Please Note: There may be leftovers for some items but not others.

*As this is in a member's home there is an attendance requirement.  Please RSVP Yes only if you fall into one of the following attendance categories:

-At least 2 events w/ the SSDOMG in 2011 & 2012 and/or

-At least 3 total events w/ the SSDOMG and South Shore Walkabouts in 2011 & 2012 and/or

-4 SSDOMG events in the last 2 years

If in doubt please RSVP Yes and we will let you know otherwise.  We want to make sure we have met up with you at least twice.  (Please Note: Those who attended the NYEE Appetizer Social - even if it was your first event - are welcome to join us!  In addition, if you joined the SSDOMG in 2012 and have attended at least one event you are welcome to join us.)

 

Join us for a few hours of fun, food, friends and learning to cook and enjoy some new foods!

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

March Cooking Class & Meal: Brunch!

Saunday, March 11th @ 11:30am-2:30pm (approximate end time +/- 1/2 hr)

Debbi's Home

Quincy, MA

Phone #: To be emailed with directions to Yes RSVPs at or shortly after the RSVP Deadline.

 

Meeting Place: Inside Debbi's apartment.

Organizers: Angela and Debbi (2011 & 2012 AM)

Cost: Between $10-$15, TBD @ Event based on cost of Food & # of Attendees (minus Debbi)

Event Fee: [Current 2012] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each; $12 to become a 2012 Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 5 by Tuesday, March 6th.  Maximum of 8 members.  These numbers include the Event Organizers

Guests: Sorry, this is members-only event.

RSVP Deadline: 10am on Saturday, February 10th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.  In addition, we will be buying the food based on the # of Yes RSVPs.  Absolutely no RSVP changes will be allowed after 9pm on Friday night.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.  This has been the SSDOMG's policy for over 5 years now and it helps avoid confusion when paying the bill.

Inclement Weather:  This event takes place rain, snow or shine.  In the case of an extreme weather forecast we will update this information around the RSVP Deadline.  Please check back here for further information.

Please see the Pages for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Will be emailed to Yes RSVPs shortly after the RSVP deadline.
item.how_to_find_us: We will give the Yes RSVPs directions right to Debbi's door.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: March Cooking Class & Meal: Brunch!
